alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 24 at 3:44AM AKDT until July 25 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM AKDT TUESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR CENTRAL INTERIOR... * AFFECTED AREA...Central Interior. * TIMING...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 AM AKDT Tuesday. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...Southwest 5 mph or less. * HUMIDITY...As low as 42 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the 80s. * IMPACTS...Lightning from scattered thunderstorms on Monday afternoon and evening could lead to new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
